These examples illustrate how to use the igpp.docgen tool with PDS3 metadata.

PDS3 is a metadata standard used to describe data in the planetary domain. It is primarily used by NASA Planetary Data System. The examples show how to generate PDS3 metadata from lists and tables. Other examples show how to use PDS3 metadata to generate other types of documents.

Example Use

Generate PDS3 metadata
Using a list of parameters and tables generate a PDS3 label to describe a data product.
Transform PDS3 metadata
Using a PDS3 label to generate a simple description of a data product.
